price: 8. Mpo ete alongisa bosôló mpe alimwisa lokuta ata bato mabe bazali koyina yango.
arabic: لِيُحِقَّ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَيُبۡطِلَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: liyuḥiqqa al-ḥaqa wayub'ṭila al-bāṭila walaw kariha al-muj'rimūna
